website_summaries.verdict: A great all-around set of irons that offers excellent quality for a lower price than some other  brands.
pros: The design of the longer clubs promotes distance and increased heights, while the shorter clubs in the set have increased accuracy
cons: Although more affordable than other brands of similar quality, they're still pricey for the beginning golfer

customer_reviews.title: Best Cavity Back Irons I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about these irons. First off they look great. Played a couple of rounds already and they look great and feel even better. Never hit a 4 iron with such a beautiful ball flight. Just great clubs period!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs
customer_reviews.text: The full set deal is fantastic compared to other sets. The shaft is perfect in steel, lighter steel shaft so you still feel the nice weight of the iron heads. The irons are really nice. Good looking sleek design and forgiving. I love that they are not overly strong degrees on them, and just handy to have the degrees on the clubs next to the iron number. The grooves are nothing special my shots are not stopping on the greens any faster than my old cobra irons, looks cool, but nothing really to it. Great turf interaction, even when I hit it fat it gets through the ground easier. Love these irons.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J Sauerhoefer

customer_reviews.title: The irons are beautiful and the shafts are gorgeous. If you love a light club  then this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: These irons feel exactly like my ten year old Clevelands with graphite shafts.
customer_reviews.author: stan mcnabb

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: You will not receive the full set. I've tried for two months to get remedy the fact that a full set was not shipped to me. This has gone on long enough that the return period has lapsed. Buyer beware! You will not receive the full set and the issue will be dragged on long enough to no longer be able to return the items. Radio silence after the return period. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid iron set
customer_reviews.text: These irons have a "hot spot" which cause the ball to go 10 yds further than normal shots. The spin produced is also lower than most irons, so they run out more. On the plus side, they are quite forgiving, do not induce hook or slice spin too much, and are relatively easy to hit. The offset each iron has is low, so if you are a slicer, don't look for help from these clubs. If you draw or hook like me, they fly quite true and help. That all said, these irons play quite well after you adjust for their run out.
customer_reviews.author: Deer Hunter

customer_reviews.title: good first set
customer_reviews.text: first set of clubs I ever bought in June 2018, no issues at all so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K. Kennedy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: A very good set of game improvement irons absolutely love they go far and love the feel when I hit them
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great clubs. Love the Cleveland wedges so I bought the irons. Solid feel. Simply great clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Hogue

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of clubs. I have only played a few rounds but so far I am enjoying them .
customer_reviews.author: steve feller

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with these irons
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with these irons. I had to have them bent 1degree up and am hitting a very nice high draw.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: With this Laser Milling and tour Zip Grooves, you get precision plus distance, in a forgiving set of irons' Gives you total control around the course.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Amengual

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Cleveland clubs.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband. He was very happy with the clubs and I was very happy with the value.
customer_reviews.author: Erieite

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Great GI clubs. Love the feel when I get through the ball square; springs off the face. Great looking clubs; inspires confidence.
customer_reviews.author: j seeley

customer_reviews.title: Long and forgiven
customer_reviews.text: Deliver perfect ahead .clubs clubs are best I had in 40 years
customer_reviews.author: jose garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my new irons. My very first shot was sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great clubs
customer_reviews.text: I liked the looks and the feel. What I like the least is I don’t get to play often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cleveland Golf 2018 Men's Launcher CBX Iron Set
product_meta.description:
The leaders in wedge spin and turf performance bring you that same technology in every iron to help you GET CLOSER from everywhere on the course.

Tour Zip Grooves + Double Laser MillingCombine to produce spin consistency from all lies.

Progressive V SoleProvides forgiveness and lift through the turf in a progressive design that is perfected for each iron.

Launcher Cup FaceProduces exceptional ball speed across the face for greater distances.

Feel Balancing TechnologyMoves weight away from the hosel and toward the impact zone for better feel and improved distance control.

New Dynamic Gold DST 98 ShaftLighter weight with a high balance point for more speed and easier launch.
